Modulate a sequence of amplitudes at the given symbol rate. Parameters:

Sequence of amplitudes.
Tb : float
Symbol period. Should be integral multiple of the sampling rate Ts.

Return the period between samples of the signal, in seconds.

Sample rate of the signal in Hz

Number of samples in the signal.

Array of sample times.
